title: Scrum-based Project Management Simulation Game Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of Agile methodology and project management basics
context.additional_context: A blended practical training program for in-service professionals combining online theoretical learning with offline simulation game activities; participants use personal devices to access collaboration tools and digital platforms

learning_goals: Learners can explain the application of Scrum framework core roles (Scrum Master, Product Owner, Development Team) to real-world project scenarios.
Learners can simulate Scrum events (Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review) through a game-based activity and derive improvement points.
Learners can implement Scrum processes and enhance team collaboration skills in resource-constrained environments using low-cost paper-pencil games.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
